data.name: Dan Vs.
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


#label_about_the_series

Dan thinks the whole world is against him. Maybe it is, and maybe it isn't -- not even his laid-back friend Chris is totally sure. Maybe Dan's just imagining it all. But, like Chris, you can't help going along for the ride when Dan dreams up his wild plots to get even with whoever or whatever he thinks is out to get him.
data.about_the_game: Dan thinks the whole world is against him. Maybe it is, and maybe it isn't -- not even his laid-back friend Chris is totally sure. Maybe Dan's just imagining it all. But, like Chris, you can't help going along for the ride when Dan dreams up his wild plots to get even with whoever or whatever he thinks is out to get him.
data.short_description: Dan thinks the whole world is against him. Maybe it is, and maybe it isn't -- not even his laid-back friend Chris is totally sure. Maybe Dan's just imagining it all.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Windows 7
  • Процессор: Intel Core 2 или аналогичный от AMD
  • Оперативная память: 1 GB ОЗУ
  • Сеть: Широкополосное подключение к интернету
  • Место на диске: 200 MB
  • Дополнительно: Скорость соединения: 5 Мбит/с для 540p, 3 Мбит/с для 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендованные:
  • ОС: Windows 10
  • Процессор: Для воспроизведения HD 1080p рекомендуется процессор Intel Core i3+ или аналогичный от AMD
  • Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ
  • Сеть: Широкополосное подключение к интернету
  • Место на диске: 500 MB
  • Дополнительно: Скорость соединения: 12 Мбит/с для 1080p или 8 Мбит/с для 720p.
